settings.heading: Tennis camps
settings.description: UTR Sports supports programs in hosting tennis camps across the U.S. for junior players! Tennis camps provide the best way for juniors to improve their games, have fun, and experience college tennis while learning from some of the best coaches in the country.

settings.heading: USTA x University of North Florida
Watch: Why coaches, players, love UTR Sports college camps
Interested in playing college tennis?
settings.list: UTR Sports has partnered with NCSA College Recruiting to help student-athletes all over the world achieve their dream of playing collegiate tennis. Sign up for a free NCSA profile and receive the following benefits:
settings.list2: Get noticed by 3,500 college tennis coaches
settings.list3: Meet with an NCSA expert for a free recruiting assessment
settings.list4: Receive a free personalized recruiting game plan

settings.heading: WATCH: Why Coaches, Players Love UTR Sports Camps
College camps
settings.description: Recommended for junior players (from beginner to elite). Fun tennis instruction led by college coaches and their experience staff. Players are grouped by level to provide each player with the best experience possible. Players get rated or improve their UTR Rating at camp with level-based match play. All players receive official camp swag and/or prizes for their participation.

settings.heading: College performance camps
settings.description: Recommended for competitive junior tournament players. High-level college-focused training led by top college coaches and their experienced staff. Players are grouped competitively to get the best experience possible. Guaranteed level-based match play during the camp that counts towards their UTR Ratings. Education sessions for diet, mental strength, fitness, and match preparation strategies.

settings.heading: College prospect camps
settings.description: Recommended for competitive junior players pursuing college tennis. Training and match play led by college coaches, emphasizing preparation for college tennis. Players are grouped competitively to get the best experience possible. Guaranteed level-based match play during the camp that counts towards their UTR Ratings. Q&A education sessions for players to learn more about the college tennis recruitment process.

settings.heading: Camps: What to know
settings.paragrap-title: No refunds, credits can be issued to a future camp at less or equal value at the same host facility. Many host sites offer summer, fall, winter camps. If you need to withdraw from a camp you must email camps@universaltennis.com to receive a credit towards a future camp at the same host facility that you registered for.

settings.quote: UTR Sports camps have the unique opportunity to play verified matches, and I find it very fun because the kids take it seriously and bring a great level of competition.
settings.name: Catherine Dunagan
settings.role: University of North Florida women's tennis head coach

settings.quote: Having run countless events, I can attest to the power of UTR Sports and how it promotes any program!
settings.name: Hannah Keeling
settings.role: Georgia Gwinnett College men's and women's tennis head coach

settings.quote: The UTR Sports camps have been a great avenue to allow TCU to provide matchplay opportunities to the community.
settings.name: Courtney Collins-Guentner

settings.description: We love partnering with UTR Sports to host camps at UNF! UTR Camps have the unique opportunity to play verified matches, and I find it very fun because the kids take it seriously and bring a great level of competition. We will continue to run these camps for years to come.
settings.author: Catherine Dunagan
settings.author-designation: Head Women's Tennis Coach, University of North Florida

settings.description: Having run countless events, I can attest to the power of UTR Sports and how it promotes any program!
settings.author: Hannah Keeling
settings.author-designation: Head Coach of Men's and Women's Tennis, Georgia Gwinnett College

settings.description: The UTR Sports camps have been a great avenue to allow TCU to provide matchplay opportunities to the community.... The players responded well to the ability to be coached during the matches and are already asking if we will be providing the camps throughout the fall.
settings.author: Courtney Collins-Guentner

settings.description: We've been hosting our winter camp for many years, but using UTR Sports for the prospect camp was the best thing we've ever done.
settings.author: Georgia Coach

settings.description: We've been hosting our winter camp for many years, but using UTR Sports for the prospect camp was the best thing we've ever done.
settings.author: Georgia Coach

settings.heading: Join UTR Sports in 3 easy steps
settings.paragrap-title: It’s easier than ever to enjoy more tennis and pickleball and connect with players near you on the UTR Sports app.
